emailAddress.label: Email address
emailAddress.email: This is not a valid email address
emailAddress.maxLength: Email address is too long. It can contains maximum {maxLength} letters.

name.label: Name
name.minLength: Name must have at least {minLength} letters.
name.maxLength: Name is too long. It can contains maximum {maxLength} letters.

surname.label: Surname
surname.minLength: Surname must have at least {minLength} letters.
surname.maxLength: Surname is too long. It can contains maximum {maxLength} letters.

password.label: Password
password.minLength: Password must be at least {minLength} characters.
password.maxLength: Password must be at most {maxLength} characters.

request.notFound: Request failed. Request endpoint not found on the server.
request.unknownServerError: There is an error on the server side. Please try again later.
request.failed: Request failed. Please try again later.
request.noResponse: Request failed. No response from the server.
